_header: Now would I fain some mirths make
_description: A Pledge of Loyalty to his Mistress — six 5-line stanzas (aabcb)

BodAsh191.First Lines:
Now wolde y fayne sum merthis makAlonly for my lades
                    sak…
BodAsh191.Last Lines:
…Vn to my endeAnd þat y may in her seruice euer to
                    Amend

CULFf16.First Lines:
Now wold I fayne sum myrthis makeAll onely ffor my ladys
                    sake…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…And neuer chaung hir for noone new vn to myne endAnd that I
                    may in hir seruise for evir amend
